summary.title: About me
summary.description: I have been working with web development since 2010, the period during which I have worked in different environments, from big consultancy companies to start-ups. I am a self-motivated and self-taught professional who likes to solve problems

career.title: Career Objective
career.description: Eager to expand my skill set through external trainings to help boost all major front desk KPIs. Hoping to leverage organizational skills to help ABC Corp introduce time-saving schemes for all executives.

companyList.name: Dummy Corporation 1
description: Use my extensive experience with front end development to <u>define the structure and components</u> for the project, making sure they are reusable
Keep the code quality high reviewing code from other developers and suggesting improvements
Interact with the designer to suggest changes and to make sure the view he has about the design is translated into actual functionality

companyList.name: Dummy Corporation 2
description: Develop web applications based on Sharepoint, Drupal 8 and Episerver
Lead a team of 10 front end developers, giving support to the client's multi-cultural team, providing feedback, clarifying requirements and helping with technical questions
Keep the Project Manager and the IT Leads updated on the overall progress of the projects and manage the tasks distributed to the team
Keep the code and the features implemented by the other developers in accordance to the requirements

companyList.name: Dummy Corporation 3
description: Design easy user interfaces and great user experiences for the digital platforms of small companies
Wordpress development, including themes creation or customization, custom plugins development and training
E-commerce maintenance with Fastcommerce, a Brazilian e-commerce platform
E-commerce development with Magento, customizing preexisting themes

key_projects.title: Key Projects / Involvements
description: Prevented millions of dollars in state sales tax undercharges by initiating tests that revealed a bug in a new release of shopping cart software.
Isolated previously undiscovered flaw in price checking tool resulting in more competitive pricing and a 20 percent increase in revenue.
Implemented automated testing tools spawning more diligent levels of regression testing, negative testing, error/bug retests and usability.
